intro.p: Write a statement involving the solutions of a vector equation that's equivalent to each claim:

p.q: The set of vectors {{vecset}} spans \mathbb R^4.
The vector equation (...)=\vec w has at least one solution for every \vec w\in\mathbb R.
The set of vectors {{vecset}} does not span \mathbb R^4.
The vector equation (...)=\vec w has no solution for at least one \vec w\in\mathbb R.

content.p: Explain how to determine which of these statements is true.

outtro.p:
The set of vectors {{vecset}}
spans
does not span
\mathbb{R}^4.
